Package uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1

Class Book

java.lang.Object
uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Displayable, IDNumber
public class Book extends Object implements Displayable, IDNumber
A class that models a book and it's details:
  • Author
  • Title
  • Genre
  • ISBN Number
  • ID Number
This class utilises the ISBNValidator class of the org.apache.commons.validator.routines package
Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Shields
See Also:
  • org.apache.commons.validator.routines
